summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KAAY-JANG educational platform. Backend APIs fully functional (14/14 tests passed). Frontend core functionality working with some UI component issues identified.

ui_bugs.issue: React runtime errors: SelectItem value prop must not be empty string
ui_bugs.details: Multiple Select components throwing runtime errors related to empty string values
Forum page elements not loading with expected test IDs
User sessions may be expiring unexpectedly or navigation state not maintained

integration_issues.issue: Language switcher present but may not be fully functional
integration_issues.details: French/English dropdown visible but content may not be switching properly

passed_tests: Admin stats display (4 users, 1 teacher, 2 students, 0 topics)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix React Select component value prop issues causing runtime errors. Investigate forum page data-testid loading problems. Verify language switching functionality is working correctly. Check session management to prevent unexpected login redirects.
